speaker: n Cutout
dialogue: Welcome to your first day at Cap’n Cutout’s Card Creations! I’m Cap’n Cutout, and I’ll be your boss fer your time here.

speaker: n Cutout
dialogue: ...but don’t think of it like I’m yer boss! We’re partners in yarrrrms!

speaker: n Cutout
dialogue: I started this small carrrd shop here when me wife and I spent two years aparrrrt.

speaker: n Cutout
dialogue: We sent each other handmade cards every week, and when we met again, we decided we wanted to spread the love to other folks!

speaker: n Cutout
dialogue: That’s why yer here. We’ve grown past the point where she and I can make our carrds. We need some help!

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Honey, would you mind picking the kids up from school?

speaker: n Cutout
dialogue: Well blow me down—errr, can I borrow the keys to the minivan?

speaker: n Cutout
dialogue: First though, the tax guy’s gonna have me head if I don’t have you fill out this paperwork. Alma will show you the ropes while I go get the little landlubbers.
